name: Towers (itch) (BuzzyBee05)
description:
Only 2 of each tower can exist at a time. Placing upgrade towers will remove the initial tower, allowing another one to be placed (For example, If I place a spread tower on a Gun tower, the Gun Tower will be destroyed and I can place another one, even if I previously had 2)

Tower guide:

- Basic Gun Tower - Shoots 1 bullet at a time over a large range with a moderate fire-rate. Can be placed anywhere.

- Spread Tower -Shoots 3 bullets in a spread over a short range with a low fire-rate. Can only be placed on Gun Towers.

- Wave Tower - Shoots low damage waves at enemies over a short range with an incredibly fast fire-rate. Can only be placed on Spread Towers.

- Circle Tower - Emits a highly damaging aura over a medium range with a moderate fire rate. Can only be placed on Wave Towers.

- Explodes on contact with enemies. Can be placed anywhere.

Enemy guide:

- Basic enemy - Moderate health, moderate speed, moderate damage

- Fast enemy - Low health, fast, low damage

- Big enemy - High health, slow, high damage

- Splitter - Moderate health, low speed, moderate damage, splits into 2 random enemies upon death
